content.detailedDescription: I seen a starlike thing in the sky when i was letting my dog out to go potty, i watched it for a while went back into my apartment and watched from the window. i noticed it had several different colored lights flashing/pulsating. at first, i thought it was an airplane, but then it would move then pause then move then pause over and over. as i am typing this, it is still in the sky. idk what it is, but it is very weird and i've never seen something like it before.
content.summary: Possible ufo hovering in sky stop and go.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were driving from manhattan, ks to clay center, ks, and witnessed a very bright object in the sky to the west. we assumed it was a planet or star, but looked it up and there are none in that direction tonight. the object seemed to stay at about 30 degrees above the horizon, although as we drove further west it seemed to drop lower toward the horizon. stayed pretty motionless, with lots of bright flashes and colors changing from red, yellow, white, blue. the object did seem to move every now and again but not a lot. we lost sight of the object as we entered clay center, as it was hidden below the tree line. tried to get a video but the camera quality was too low to capture it. we both were curious and wanted to follow it but had to get our little guy to bed.
content.summary: Object appeared like a bright star or planet in the west, but upon further observation it was pulsating and changing colors from white, red, yellow, blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on amherst road in pelham, ma at approximately 9pm.  it was a perfectly clear evening sky.  i had an unobstructed view of the sky looking eastward.  a extremely bright white light about 2-3 times the size of venus suddenly appeared directly ahead of me in the sky at approximately 45 degree angle.  it looked like an artificial light rather than the twinkling light of a celestial object of the "fuzzy" light of a meteor. due to its sudden appearance and brightness it caught my attention and i initially thought it might be the headlight of an oncoming aircraft. the light remained stationery for approximately 2 seconds and then shot off to the north in a straightline at an extremely high speed. in one half of a second it travelled a distance of a quarter of the sky and then simply disappeared.  its path was horizontal to the ground.  it left no trail and there was no noise.
content.summary: Bright stationery light which quickly flew northward

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside walking the dog when i noticed this very bright planet looking object in the sky on the western horizon.

it looked like a bright planet or super large, bright star.  i checked the internet but there is not a planet at that location right now.

the orb was a super bright light changing between a white, red, orange and yellow light.
content.summary: The object was not there earlier this evening or any other evening prior to tonight

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out my window and
 seen it hovering above my home.
content.summary: It hovered in the sky for a good 30 minutes above my house

content.detailedDescription:
Looked out my window and
 seen it hovering above my home.
content.summary: It hovered in the sky for a good 30 minutes above my house

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching television in the upstairs attic space, when there appeared to be a strobing of light. checked the room, but when i turned to my right, strobing stopped.

i check again, then looked to my right, peripherally, and saw a bluish vessel, the skin looked like heavy plastic, had rotating lights and stationary lights and it had a front "windows" that were dark, i could not see it. 

when i looked right at it, it disappeared. when i looked back toward my tv, using my eyes to pan right, it was there again, and of course, whenever i looked at my tv, the stobbing began again.

after a minute or so, i got pretty tired of this and yelled at it to leaver if they had no other reason being there than to look. they left after another fifteen or so seconds. 


a dozen years earlier, i came home at 1:30 am. i had left my curtains open and the tv on, intruder discourager, and as i was pulling my bags from my trunk, i looked up and leaning into the window, from behind curtains was a being that looked out at me, acted stunned and surprised and quickly, and frankly comically pulled back out of view. it was metallic, very agile and iridescent, almost opaque.

well, i was pretty interested in what was going on, so quickly moved on, into my home, but nothing. absolutely nothing.   

a few years earlier i had a ghostly encounter, but the sprit and i had achieved successful cohabitation, other than she liked to do things to freak-out visitors.  after getting comfortable with this spirit, a few other encounters, but none more with other beings until the "opaque man," and the recent vessel encounter.

they seem to have interest in me, but no lost time, so have to believe i have not been taken, and it's obvious, and i have no clear understanding as to why, i'm not fearful. i mean, who yells at a vessel that has pushed through their ceiling?

no evidence of anything other than the spirits that came through that home. i've moved since, and the primary spirit followed me here. for some reason, it appears she's very protective, but not intrusive.

but i swear on the graves of my parents the lives every relative i have on this earth, including my own, obviously, that what i've describe happened and i have not found a way to tell anyone, who may help me to understand some context, before now.

i'm starting a nonprofit related to global warming, so that's why i want to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Watching tv, strobe lights, looked, nothing, then peripherally saw it pointed at me, not directly, pushed thru ceiling; silent, left after 2 or 3 mins

content.detailedDescription:
Kharghar, sec 27, 
near gurudrawa, near iscon temple, before tata cancer institute, above the golf course.
latitude -  19° 3'15.80"n
longitude -  73° 3'36.45"e
august 2014,
time 4-4:30 am in morning,

black triangle hovering,
silent,
three pulsating lights - green, blue, red.
rotating - anti-clock wise - slow motion,
duration - 1 min,
was returning from office, when i saw the lights, my driver also saw it. when i just thought to click from my mobile camera the picture, it just vanished. as if my thoughts were being read by it. also i asked my driver if he could see the rotating lights in the sky, he said yes. the triangle ufo just vanished. witnessed by me & two different drivers. happened on two different days in morning hours.

after 2-3 days at 5:10 in the morning, my battery of my clock had drained out, when i had replaced a new one. it was thursday. on friday my flat members came to my house to meet me as i had just shifted. when i narrated my incident of battery draining, 2 other flat owners were surprised as 2-3 days back their batteries had also drained out. its pretty surprising. there is an air force base nearby. i can distinguish between an aero-plane & an ufo.
content.summary: Black triangle hovering, silent, three pulsating lights - green, blue, red. rotating - anti-clock wise - slow motion, duration - 1 min,

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was in my back yard at approx. 12:15 am weds. (02/25/2015)

2. i noticed sound of a jet on afterburners traveling from se to nw and upon catching up with the sound, i located the jets blinking lights .

3 and 4. at first glimpse of blinking lights of the jet on afterburners (possibly a fighter from maguire afb) i saw one very high appearing single light (like a dull distant star) traveling due east and gently arching to sw at a steady high rate of speed that this usaf vet would calculate as 10 to 20 times faster than i have ever seen. it was breath taking. it was not the typical shooting star speed used in movies - but very steady and with zero changes in light intensity or textures. if i had to guesss speed i would guess mach 5 as a minimum.

5. i felt it was man made. it displayed all the characteristics of a craft as opposed to a celestial body. i have seen many shooting stars and meteors in my 67 years. there was nothing spectacular about it's appearance but the speed was awe inspiring.

6. from the time of first sighting in the ne to the visible arching horizon line in the sw this craft to about 10 seconds to go horizon to horizon. i watch planes from maguire and philly fly a major route over the bordentown area almost nightly and nothing come close to less than two to three minutes to clear that distance.

i think it is a us black ops craft. it displayed no other worldly characteristics as commonly shown on tv, other than speed.
content.summary: Jet a/c on afterburners caused me to look up a catch sight of a hign altitude very high speed steady path light. usaf vet

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way over to my pancake committee meeting at around 4am, todays meeting was going to be taken by the legendary jimmy mcspaceman and i couldn't be late. suddenly i saw a glowing object coming from behind the moon. quickly, it came down to ground level and landed in an unknown area (some sort of field possibly). a small 'person' appeared on the ground, with ginger skin and hair in some areas. the creature seemed able to transform as, suddenly, right before my eyes, they transformed into a leaf. they wandered around until they, eventually, got back into their transport vehicle which seemed to crumble and disintegrate right before my eyes.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pancake association ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: Hi, this is my 3rd and final awesome [non-human]made thing i and 11++ people that seen these 2 orbs just silently coming from the south[ first seen by my sons friend also recorded by him with a good quality digital camera]and he run in our house to tell us about it so we all can see it...I came outside to see 2 orange orbs not very big [like a larger sized softball] were directly overhead,not a sound at all, it was about a 3story house and a half high so about 50-60' i guess...There was nothing to make out of this,,it was just 2 silently moving to the north just like 2 fish swimming in one direction while going around eachother and near eachother kinda like playing until about 1-2 minutes into my sighting these [1] just slow without any change in what it is doing, it slowly dimmed its orange light until it is completely out,,and the one stay until it went deep into the clouds[out-of-sight..So i have no idea what, even if this was 2 remote control things by man,,,what was its propultion,or fuel?  this was very quiet, not a sound.. then we have a distance of 3++ miles and still going away from its primay place of origin..Still even if a remote control is possible at that distance by man,,,not the silent engine.....I don't have the video,,,i will try to get it from him,,i know he did put this on youtube,,,i'll see what i can do...
content.summary: 2 amber/orange orbs moving like 2 birds chasing eachother

content.detailedDescription:
Standing out in front of our country home early in the morning my wife and i saw this objsect come over the house headding in a s w dirrection just a little above the tree line. no noise and a very bright light, round in shape with no distinguishing features that we noticed. just a bright light and no noise, as we watched this for about 10 to 15 minutes as it flew past. i looked over to the wife and told her she just saw here first ufo, my first experiance was in the summer of 1976 when me and three of my freinds had an experiance that to this day i still have dreams about. all i can remember other than watching this ufo fly away over the trees as i was running toward it waving my arms. one of my freinds tackeled me in the driveway and they drug me back to the car and they took off. i only recall walking down a hallway, rounded in shape, and going past a small room where one of my friends was sitting on a table with his head hung low and his hands folded in front of him. we lost just over 2 hours of time that night, and back then no one wanted to tell anyone bout this kind if thing because everyone then though you were crazy.
i would really like to try hipnosis to see if i can recall more of this experiance.
content.summary: Standing in front of our house and this object early in the am & this thing just came over the hosue adn keept going in the same dirrection with no noise. i told the wife we just saw a ufo. (this is my second experiance. 1st time was 1975 on board

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 15+ year ufologist in the memphis metro area, & although i have seen things i can't explain, this is the first one worthy of reporting.  for this particular incident, i've been seeing bright lights in that same location for several nights in the last week, but it was after i went to bed and not compelling enough to warrant running outside.  it snowed yesterday, so it made it easier to see last night, and the craft was much closer, much brighter, and very visible.  i ran outside at 12:46am cst and began filming.  it was hovering very low over an area with corn fields.  i observed it hovering for about 20 minutes, but it was too cold outside and i ran out straight from bed with no shoes on in the snow, therefore, i could only film for a short time.  after about 20 minutes it seemed to just vanish...No flight path was observed...Just hovering and pulsating lights that appeared to have a red glow at times. it appeared to be one very large triangular aircraft, and it was hovering so low that it had a 3-d effect when viewing.  there were times when it appeared to have ejected smaller orb lights, but that is unclear.  it was difficult to tell from my vantage point whether it was part of the larger craft, or additional smaller craft.  here is the video clip:  [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

[name and organization removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: I observed a bright light outside my bedroom window & ran outside to begin filming.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on i-20 e from birmingham to atlanta, and saw a triangular-shaped object with four lights off to my left. i continued driving about 65 or 70 mph while i observed the craft. it seemed to be hovering, or moving so slowly that i couldn't tell. 

it first caught my eye because it shined a light, which looked like a searchlight. it was foggy, so the searchlight really stood out. at first i thought it was a helicopter shining a searchlight, but the triangular shape of the lights didn't seem to be a helicopter. the searchlight turned off about 10 seconds after i noticed it.

as i got a bit closer, i couldn't really make out the shape of the craft. it definitely resembled a triangle instead of a helicopter, like i initially thought it was.

the lights were white at first, and faded to red, then to a light green, then back to white. all of the lights changed color at once, and they did not blink.


this was the approximate shape of the object (x's are the lights):

         x
       /   \
     /       \
    x----x----x


it seemed to hover in place for around a minute before i passed it and it was out of sight. i passed exit 156 on i-20 e a minute or two after i saw the object.
content.summary: Triangle-shaped with 4 lights, hovering

content.detailedDescription: I went out in my backyard and i was having a cigarettei looked up and i started to see 1 round red orange orb start to come up from behind the trees then a second 1 did about 100 feet from that 1 they moved in unison together heading north east and they traveled for probably about 1000 2000 feet then 1 of the object look like candle wax dripping fire then disappeared the second object flu towards the p_g_&_e power station and tell it got almost above it and then disappeared i called my wife out to look at my wife seen it my son seen it i seen and i took a picture of it it does not do justice to what i seen when it came up behind the trees and lasted for i want to say 6 to 7 minutes that seems like a soon as i started to take a picture with my camera the object started to drip l8ke candle wax on fire.
content.summary: 2 bright lights moving at the same about 200 ft apart but moved together .Wife me son seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night i went out to smoke a cigarette on my friends front porch and took a video on my iphone of what i believe to be a ufo. my friend and i were getting ready to go bowling, i had not been drinking and was not under the influence of any drugs. at approximately 7pm est is when i went outside. about 1-2 minutes later i noticed a source of light in the sky partially obscured by a tree. i can't really say how i first noticed it, i was facing that direction and it just kind of caught my eye, and for a split second figured it was an airplane, however quickly realized it did not have the qualities of an aircraft. and in fact very shortly before recording the video i clearly observed an airplane to the east of my location and could clearly see aircraft identification lights (red and green blinking on the wing). 

i was facing wsw towards the object, which appeared to be traveling north. the light was actually two solid white lights very close to each other (sort of looked like car headlights from a distance, though it was way too high to be a car on a hill- there are no mountains in ohio). these lights did not blink what-so-ever, although they may appear too in the video as they pass behind the silhouetted tree branches, i assure you they were very solid bright lights. there was not any standard aircraft green and red lights associated with it either. the lights moved smoothly across the landscape in a straight line until completely blocked by a conifer tree and then houses, which is when i stopped recording. i observed the object for about 2-3 more seconds after the video stops, as it passed between the conifer tree and the row of houses. one of my friends that lives there was inside the house at when i first noticed the object, but by the time i yelled for him to step outside it was behind the houses and out of view. i showed him the video however, and he agreed it was strange looking and likely not a man-made aircraft.

i was excited when i concluded that i didn't believe this object to be an aircraft, as i am an avid ufo believer, i had seen and reported an amazing sighting from 2002-ish, where myself and 5 other friends very clearly observed a noiseless, hexagonal shaped metallic craft aprox. 100ft in diameter, only about 10 feet above the tree line with green, purple, and white pulsating lights, which very slowly hovered in a single direction until out of view. this was in the day-time and we all saw it very clearly and all to this day cannot explain it and still talk about it often. ever since then i have had my eyes trained to the sky.
content.summary: Observed two solid light sources travelling in a straight line

content.detailedDescription:
It was happened in kodaikanal as i was persuing my bba in my college. it happened at evening, as me and my were interacting near the our hostel. a sudden fireball of light appeared on sky and was moving fast and went behind the mountain. 
the sound and the greenish flame made me notice the object. 
at first i thought it was a shootingstar. i think after a few days, the water in kodaikanal lake showed a boiling nature by providing bubbles in water. i hop certain particles are still in lake. i always felt a alien presence at kodaikanal as because kodaikanal is a place situated in india which is to the lower middle regions of india. from a distinct allocation of place ( from above sky) in india concentrates on the regions of kodaikanal and kodaikanal also has a cold climate.
the object was moving from north to east at a speed of around 500 km - 1000 km / hour.
as everyone was believed in shooting star and meteors i also felt the same. but i believe in aliens and their study in our planet earth they creates and modifies the living creature under for a further purposed for future. during this period of time my eye vision also changed, now i believe it's because of this..... i have no arguments on aliens but as a a part of this world and creations we also have certain duties toward the nature and all particles of this world. as it is said " time is only the true unit of measurement." and i think" circles are the real findings to unlock this time as per my findings. hope to be a part of knowing my home world.....
content.summary: A fireball of light over the mountains and strange natural observations over the places.

content.detailedDescription: I was out for my daily 4am pancake run, where i run as fast as i can to the nearest pancake committee and make sure my views are heard. as i was careering round the corner, i saw it. at first i thought it was a normal ford ka, nothing out of the ordinary. but when the "teenager" left the vehicle i knew the truth. out of his head sprouted a bright orange straw-like material. a ginger. then as he pressed the button to lock his car the headlights flashed white and as soon as they had, the mothership was before me. the monster called it "his mum's land rover". he transformed before my eyes, into a green leaf, with orange hair sprouting out of his armpits. then he bit a nearby dog and his car began to fly and change shape. it let off an aura of animal mutilation. he checked his watch to make he was on time to report to the mothership. "mother!" came the screeching cry, "i am ready to mutilate animals!"
content.summary: Ford ka

content.detailedDescription:
As i was a student at kodaikanal college,our hostel is situated on top of a  mountain i was interacting with my friends outside our room. a sudden light appeared and i saw a fireball of light got saperat and went over the mountains, which was towards kodaikanal city. a few days later a form of bubble was observed in kodaikanal lake.Which shocked me of volcanic eruption. i believe in a superpower which tells me about certain natural observations and which leads to the mysterious big bang theory. 
 when i first noticed it,  i thought it was simpaly a shooting star. i was been studying many research and documentary on aliens. i believe the great egyptians and mayan had a generic relation with the father's of our world or they are connected with aliens. 
the object was a fire ball passing on top of mountain with greenish yellow light of fire. it appeared to be green for me.
the object become out of sight when it moved behind the mountain.
content.summary: A fireball over the mountains and strange natural observations

content.detailedDescription: I've never seen anything like this it was a bright white pulsing light witch i saw go dawn behind the house but never saw it leave i could not inspect as i'm on crutches and my partner would not let me go out as it was dark and there are fields behind the houses were i saw it go dawn. in andover where i am at nite there's always. every nite white lights that looks like stars or things in the dissents with diffrant colours flashing but there always moving and need help finding out what they r as there there every nite

content.detailedDescription:
Engineer report.
unusual spacecraft disc shaped near air port grey color large -med size entered the earth atmosphere easterly turned northerly and exited earth atmosphere. has occurred more than 3times. it appears the craft entered the atmosphere momentarily to observe the airport area and the flights of the pilots near the airport. not an airplane. real factual sightings -keep in mind all science fields are under laws to report the truth with all sincerity.  

this sighting seemed to have paused our airspace for a few moments. no hostility by the craft. lights were seen on the edges of the crafts design. color seemed red, green and others. danger! spacecraft near miami international airport in the state of florida. your best approach. use radioactive counter to detect unusual radiation residue in the airspace and on the ground. magnetic readings are dim and in the airspace the ionized oxgen nitrogen  will reduce detection. warning! intergalactic space travelers are centuries beyond our comprehension as many as over 300 centuries. 

former government.
god didn't make them yesterday.

content.detailedDescription:
A few weeks ago, i "awoke" to find myself in a weird room with oval shaped chairs. in each chair, there was a being of some kind; some grey/human hybrids, greys (some were more brown), and what appeared to be humans. to me, they appeared to be dead. no movement, not even breathing, that is associated with sleep. to my right, a dark skinned grey sat up and looked at me. a slight change in it's face seemed like it was surprised. the grey jumped down from the chair but a change occurred. everything seemed to be become more relaxing. the grey became more lumpy and disproportionate similar to a cartoon character. i had experiences in which "reality" was more of an illusion. i asked the being if the first form was it's real skin but i awoke with the idea that i hurt one of them in a panic.

in 1996, my dad visited germany on a business trip. my mom had parkinson's disease so i stayed with her while he was gone. one friday night in late summer, my mom and i would watch tv once my college classes ended. we fell asleep on the couches. mine was against the wall and my mom was in the other couch next to the wall partition. from my old room, i heard a loud pop sound. out from my room, i seen my dad walk down the hall but his image seemed to flash with the image of a grey. it went to my mom and told her to sleep in her bed, she got up and went to her room. i felt calm despite this being impersonating my father. the being came extremely close me and it asked telepathically, if i seen a ufo complete with an image of one in my mind. i told it that it wasn't my father, he is in germany, and it calmly walked by into my room as i laughed at it. another loud pop was heard and i feel asleep. my mom did confirm it did happen but she died in october 1998.

the final occurrence i want recorded occurred when i was 14 years old in 1991. my memory wasn't clear but i remember walking to a ufo hovering a few feet above the ground in the backyard, escorted by a couple greys. next thing they did was asked if i could fix a generator type machine. i said i couldn't to which the responded they had the wrong time period and i was back in bed with a grey looking at me through the window. the greys informed me they are time travelers and i had something to do with their time machines. the machine they shown me was like a barrel with some clear sections. lights of different colors seemed ethereal and i think there are components spinning. i kept thinking about it and time travel. i came to the conclusion that it may have been a type of collider like lhc or a spinning set of devices but to produce a "black hole" for electromagnetic fields, higgs fields, and gravity (space-time) with possible the nuclear forces. it's 1950's b-film science but it's the best i could do. the greys imparted a need to figure out time travel or at least be interested. weird but that is what i remember.
content.summary: Series of abductions by greys that claimed they are time travelers

content.detailedDescription: In the house got home from work, my wife yelling to get outside. saw 4 objects in line crusing along and disappearing into atmosphere , wow what is that could not come up with an answer. the un identifiable  object disappeared into the atmosphere as you can see on the video recording. this is a remarkable video !!!
content.summary: Saw flying object and started recording with my iphone .

content.detailedDescription: I saw a triangle dark in color ascending above a smaller sphere shape ship into the sky.  this ship (ships)follows me wherever i go. then it hovers near my home. my car as i am driving shoves forward and tilts low to the ground as if it is carrying weight in front ....I have a small chevrolet aveo. i see gas surround me in my car, my skin and eyes burn. and then they talk non-stop in my head...In my ears about what damage they have done and intend to do as they say every household in america will be hit.....My head burns. my head and ears stay red all the time my skin always has white residue on it and it burns...My teeth have been damaged, my skin and body appears to be aging very rapidly. they are using the portal of their ship as a tracking device as you can see a cloud of dark gas hovering around the car and my home i just moved from forney tx to waco tx dec 24, 2014 (while in forney i sent to mufon numerous reports) to a new house it passed a very thorough inspection and was without damage....Two months later i see heat damage as the paint on the walls looks like it is melting.  my belongings are  being damaged my cars are damaged.....They point the laser weapon/portal at my home and neighborhood all the time.  looked out my back door last night and was feeling pulsating pressure in my head and body and hearing the pulsating noise i saw the ship appeared to be turned on its side and its light was pulsating and rotating exactly to what i was feeling...They are doing this non-stop i reported sighting here to police when i first moved in.  this has been going on for a long time. i am so worried and fearful this is very wide spread and the public needs to be warned of what has happen and what to watch out for. i saw several of these gas cloud streams coming from the sky to my house and the surrounding areas the gas is shoved into any opening in your home air ducts, doors......Etc......Once in they use orbs and hide in unseen spots in your house the gas gives them energy to move about and cause severe damage they are using as lasers.
content.summary: Followed with tracking device on my car. then hovering near my home

content.detailedDescription:
On july 1, which doing report for , was early hours morning, stood in back garden at patio door, then like a star but bigger crossed the path of  stars in front of me, so i grabbed the camera, and as i zoomed in was plain to see it was far from a star , it changed shapes and colors way beyond a drone plane or helicopter could, at the time i felt strange as watching what i was recording i couldnt believe it
but then month after , i got a short 20seconds of the exact same thing again, and then week after that a different kind of orb pulsing with loads of color changes from yellow to indigo purple red green blue and many more 
the first video , file 1, is the july sighting, 
file 2 is the same craft 1 month later 
file 3 and 4 is something else like a orb shape not changing shapes like the 1st 2nd video
content.summary: Changed color and shape nurmous times , seen above then again month later got on vid also as 1st 1, exact same one
I saw this bright light for about 20 minutes,from multiple streets. it was very bright and much bigger than a star.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed looking out my window and it suddenly became light like day time and a couple of seconds later i saw the actual object flying in a straight line and it was the color white with a glowing trail of something that was the same color of the object.
content.summary: Saw a bright light lighten my room up like daylight then i look out my window and saw a disce like shape fly pass

content.detailedDescription: Went out to fill wood stove on feb23 2015 seen strange lights took pic with wife camera,the on feb 24,2015 went out to fill wood stove and seen two big white lights with blue center and took pics. i thought i seen a ufo it was really big. cylinder shape shape object horizontally white top and bottom blue center that pulsated and left like a trail sometimes.I was a little uneasy about seeing this. it was so cold i had to go in.
content.summary: Seen 2 big white lights with blue light in center pulsating

content.detailedDescription:
We were living in cupey baja puerto rico in 1977 to 1978. i was inside planning to go outside so i went to the back yard where i got my kite stuck in some power lines, i was attempting to loosen the kite with string and rocks, while i was doing that i heard a buzzing (like bees) other wise no sound.When i looked up and this strange looking flying shape shifting object with white and red, blue lights around it 
the white and red, blue lights around it, the center of the craft appeared grayish, off black.
what made me first notice the object was a humming and buzzing sound.  i was also looking up to try and release my kite off the power-lines 
i first thought it was a blimp because of it's grayish color, but then i looked. carefully, and it was shape shifting as if it were trying to cloak it's  real shape it seemed to be losing power, going on moving real slow in the air, it hovered for a few seconds over the power lines, it almost appeared to me as it was about to crash, but suddenly it continued to follow the power lines to the other end  the motion of the object was slow and steady over the power lines.  i kept watching it in awe. i was incredibly amazed and i kept watching it. this occurred in broad daylight, no one else was outside to witness this object i wished someone else could be seeing what i was seeing  my feelings while i was watching this shape shifting object was of awe, shock, and incredulity. i couldn't really move, i was incredibly amazed at what i was watching. the object just kept flying over the power lines to the other end of the power lines to the other end of the island. i lost sight of the object while i kept my eyes on it until it was too far away to see any longer. it kept following the power lines in a slow motion factor with the white and red and blue lights around it, it resembled to me like a miv shaped brown bag.  very hard to describe due to its shape shifting.
content.summary: I was outside trying to release my kite off the power lines and the object appeared

content.detailedDescription: I guess i should include some background information with this report. for the last 23 years i have been observing ufo's in this area. thankfully the majority are friendly. i have one who actually hangs out in the southwestern sky on any clear night he can be seen hanging out possibly observing the activity in the area. from local records he has been in the area for at least a 150 years. saterday i took my dog outside to do his business and for those who have seen my previous reports he will actually alert me to the presence of a strange ufo or something going on with our local guy. i think they may make a sound that only a dog can hear. he is not afraid of them, they just hurt his ears. he will usually sit on the ground and whine with his nose pointed to the sky until i look up and take notice of what is going on. saturday he did not sit but did whine loudly just as he got out into our yard and i looked upward at the sky, being overcast it took me a few seconds to locate the ufo in question and it was one of the local lights mother ships, and it was the larger of the two and it was only about the third time i have seen this one. usually it is one of the smaller mother ships that come around and check on things. it was firing in several different directions, straight up, to the southwest and southeast, as well as northwest. it seemed to be surrounded by hostile ufo,s. this was still going on at 10:30 pm when i took for his last run for the night since it was cold he stays inside. i was in a local hospital (non related) for several days and did not return till yesterday. last night i went out with my dog again and the large mother ship was being helped out by several others and were having a mexican stand off with a large dark, unlighted object over my head. they were not firing at each other that i could see, but they seemed to be preventing the other much larger object from leaving the area. on two other occasions i have seen larger friendly saucer shaped objects overhead in simmular situations but they were not present last night. i hope that they come if needed though. i will update mufon on any changes when i able to see them at night.
content.summary: Multiple objects seen over a five day period shooting at each other
